displayName.english: This good boy deserves a treat!
displayName.french: Ce bon toutou mérite une friandise !
displayName.german: Dieser brave Hund verdient ein Leckerli!
displayName.schinese: 这好狗狗应该犒劳一下！
displayName.tchinese: 這個乖寶寶應該得到獎勵！
displayName.japanese: よしよし、ご褒美をあげよう！
displayName.dutch: Dit brave beest verdient een snoepje!
displayName.turkish: Uslu dostun güzel bir ödülü hak ediyor!

description.english: Feed the dog 10 times
description.french: Nourrir le chien 10 fois
description.german: Füttere den Hund 10-mal.
description.italian: Dai da mangiare al cane 10 volte
description.spanish: Dale comida al perro 10 veces
description.japanese: 犬に10回エサをあげる
description.dutch: Voer de hond 10 keer
description.brazilian: Alimente o cachorro 10 vezes

description.english: Wake up from your slumber
description.french: Se réveiller de votre torpeur
description.german: Erwache aus deinem Schlaf
description.italian: Svegliati dal pisolino
description.spanish: Despierta de tu duermevela
description.japanese: 目を覚ます
description.dutch: Ontwaak uit je slaap
description.brazilian: Acorde do repouso

description.english: Pet the dog 20 times
description.french: Caresser le chien 20 fois
description.german: Streichle den Hund 20-mal.
description.italian: Accarezza il cane 20 volte
description.spanish: Acaricia al perro 20 veces
description.japanese: 犬を20回なでる
description.dutch: Aai de hond 20 keer
description.brazilian: Faça carinho no cachorro 20 vezes

description.english: Save the dog from the hunters
description.french: Sauver le chien des chasseurs
description.german: Rette den Hund vor den Jägern
description.italian: Salva il cane dai cacciatori
description.spanish: Salva al perro de los cazadores
description.japanese: ハンターから犬を守る
description.dutch: Red de hond van de jagers
description.brazilian: Salve o cachorro dos caçadores

displayName.french: Les chiens, ça me fait pas peur
displayName.spanish: Los perros no me dan miedo
displayName.brazilian: Não tenho medo de nenhum cão

description.english: Make sure the hunting dogs leave the boars alone
description.french: S’assurer que les chiens de chasse laissent les sangliers tranquilles
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass die Jagdhunde die Wildschweine in Ruhe lassen
description.italian: Assicurati che i cani da caccia lascino in pace i cinghiali
description.spanish: Haz que los perros de caza dejen en paz a los jabalíes
description.russian: Следите за тем, чтобы охотничьи собаки не трогали кабанов
description.japanese: 猟犬がイノシシに近づかないようにする
description.polish: Zadbaj, by psy myśliwskie zostawiły dziki w spokoju
description.dutch: Zorg dat de jachthonden de zwijnen met rust laten
description.turkish: Av köpeklerinin yaban domuzlarını rahat bırakmasını sağla
description.arabic: تأكد من أن كلاب الصيد تترك الخنازير البرية وشأنها.
description.brazilian: Não deixe que os cães de caça atrapalhem o sossego dos javalis

description.english: Defeat the hunters to save your dog
description.french: Vaincre les chasseurs pour sauver votre chien
description.german: Besiege die Jäger, um deinen Hund zu retten
description.italian: Sconfiggi i cacciatori e salva il tuo cane
description.spanish: Derrota a los cazadores para salvar a tu perro
description.schinese: 打败猎人以拯救你的小狗
description.russian: Одолейте охотников, чтобы спасти свою собаку
description.japanese: ハンターを倒して犬を守る
description.polish: Pokonaj myśliwych i uratuj swojego szczeniaczka
description.dutch: Versla de jagers om je hond te redden
description.brazilian: Derrote os caçadores e salve seu cachorro

description.english: Finish the game
description.french: Terminer le jeu
description.german: Schließe das Spiel ab
description.italian: Completa il gioco
description.spanish: Acaba el juego
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアする
description.dutch: Voltooi het spel
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo

description.english: Stay hidden during hide'n'seek for 30 seconds
description.french: Rester caché pendant 30 secondes durant la partie de cache-cache
description.german: Bleib beim Versteckspiel 30 Sekunden lang versteckt
description.italian: Durante il nascondino, non farti scoprire per 30 secondi
description.spanish: Escóndete 30 segundos jugando al escondite
description.schinese: 在捉迷藏游戏中躲藏30秒
description.tchinese: 在捉迷藏中躲藏 30 秒
description.russian: Оставайтесь незамеченными во время игры в прятки в течение 30 секунд
description.japanese: かくれんぼで30秒間隠れ続ける
description.polish: Pozostań w ukryciu przez 30 sekund w trakcie zabawy w chowanego
description.dutch: Blijf 30 seconden verborgen tijdens verstoppertje spelen
description.arabic: ابق مختبئًا خلال لعبة الغميضة لمدة 30 ثانية
description.brazilian: Fique escondido durante o esconde-esconde por 30 segundos

description.english: Get rid of 20 fog clouds
description.french: Se débarrasser de 20 nuages de brouillard
description.german: Beseitige 20 Nebelwolken
description.italian: Sbarazzati di 20 nuvole di nebbia
description.spanish: Deshazte de 20 nubes de niebla
description.japanese: 霧を20回消滅させる
description.dutch: Verdrijf 20 mistwolken
description.brazilian: Livre-se de 20 nuvens de neblina

description.english: Throw snowballs at 5 different kinds of animals
description.french: Lancer des boules de neige sur 5 types d’animaux différents
description.german: Wirf Schneebälle auf 5 verschiedene Tierarten
description.italian: Lancia palle di neve a 5 diversi tipi di animali
description.koreana: 서로 다른 종의 동물 5마리에게 눈 뭉치 던지기
description.spanish: Lanza bolas de nieve a 5 tipos de animales distintos
description.schinese: 朝5种不同的动物投掷雪球
description.tchinese: 對 5 種不同的動物扔雪球
description.russian: Бросьте снежки в пять различных видов животных
description.japanese: 5種類の動物に雪玉を投げる
description.dutch: Gooi sneeuwballen naar 5 verschillende soorten dieren
description.arabic: ارمِ كرات الثلج على 5 أنواع مختلفة من الحيوانات.
description.brazilian: Arremesse bolas de neve em 5 tipos de animal diferentes

description.english: Build 2 snowmen not far from each other
description.french: Fabriquer 2 bonshommes de neige l’un près de l’autre
description.german: Baue 2 Schneemänner in kleiner Entfernung zueinander
description.italian: Crea 2 pupazzi di neve a poca distanza l'uno dall'altro
description.koreana: 서로 멀지 않은 곳에 눈사람 2개 만들기
description.spanish: Haz 2 muñecos de nieve cerquita
description.schinese: 堆起两个彼此相距不远的雪人
description.tchinese: 做出 2 個相距不遠的雪人
description.russian: Слепите двух снеговиков недалеко друг от друга
description.japanese: 2体の雪だるまを近づけて作る
description.dutch: Maak 2 sneeuwpoppen dicht bij elkaar
description.turkish: Birbirinden uzak olmayan 2 kardan adam yap
description.arabic: قم ببناء رَجلين من الثلج بالقرب من بعضهما البعض.
description.brazilian: Faça 2 bonecos de neve não muito distantes um do outro

description.english: Put any hat on the dog
description.french: Placer un chapeau sur le chien
description.german: Setze dem Hund einen beliebigen Hut auf
description.italian: Fai indossare un cappello qualunque al cane
description.spanish: Ponle un sombrero al perro
description.japanese: 犬に帽子を被せる
description.dutch: Zet de hond een hoed op
description.arabic: ضَع أي قبعة على رأس الكلب
description.brazilian: Coloque qualquer chapéu no cachorro

displayName.english: Is there a clothing store nearby?
displayName.french: Y a-t-il une chapellerie pas loin ?
displayName.german: Gibt es ein Bekleidungsgeschäft in der Nähe?
displayName.italian: C'è un negozio di vestiti qui vicino?
displayName.spanish: ¿Habrá una tienda de ropa por aquí?
displayName.japanese: この辺りに服屋はありませんか？
displayName.polish: Jest tu jakiś sklep z ciuchami?
displayName.dutch: Is er een kledingwinkel in de buurt?
displayName.turkish: Yakınlarda bir giysi dükkanı var mı?
displayName.arabic: هل هناك متجر قريب لبيع الملابس؟
displayName.brazilian: Alguma loja de roupa por perto?

description.english: Pick up all the hats in the game
description.french: Ramasser tous les chapeaux du jeu
description.german: Sammle alle Hüte im Spiel auf
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i cappelli del gioco
description.spanish: Recoge todos los sombreros del juego
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中撿起所有帽子
description.japanese: ゲーム内の帽子を全て拾う
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie nakrycia głowy w grze
description.dutch: Verzamel alle hoeden in het spel
description.brazilian: Pegue todos os chapéus do jogo

displayName.english: Look at the butterflies, smell the flowers
displayName.french: Regarder les papillons voler, humer les fleurs
displayName.german: Genieße die Farbenpracht der Schmetterlinge und den Duft der Blumen
displayName.italian: Ammira le farfalle, odora i fiori
displayName.spanish: Admira las mariposas; huele las florecillas
displayName.japanese: 蝶々の羽ばたき、花の香り
displayName.dutch: Kijk naar de vlinders, ruik aan de bloemen
displayName.brazilian: Olhe as borboletas, sinta o cheiro das flores

description.english: Stay near butterflies until the end of the song
description.french: Rester près des papillons jusqu’à la fin de la chanson
description.german: Bleibe bei den Schmetterlingen, bis das Lied endet
description.italian: Non ti allontanare dalle farfalle fino al termine della canzone
description.koreana: 노래가 끝날 때까지 나비 근처에 머물기
description.spanish: Quédate junto a las mariposas hasta que acabe la canción
description.schinese: 待在蝴蝶附近直到曲终
description.tchinese: 待在蝴蝶附近，直到歌曲結束
description.russian: Оставайтесь рядом с бабочками до конца песни
description.japanese: 曲の終わりまで蝶々のそばにいる
description.polish: Pozostań w pobliżu motyli do końca piosenki
description.dutch: Blijf tot het einde van het liedje in de buurt van vlinders
description.turkish: Şarkının sonuna kadar kelebeklerin yanında kal
description.arabic: ابقَ بالقرب من الفراشات حتى نهاية الأغنية
description.brazilian: Fique perto das borboletas até o final da música

description.english: Stay 2 minutes at a campfire
description.french: Rester 2 minutes près d’un feu de camp
description.german: Bleibe 2 Minuten lang am Lagerfeuer
description.italian: Resta per 2 minuti vicino al falò
description.spanish: Quédate 2 minutos cerca de una hoguera
description.japanese: 焚き火で2分過ごす
description.dutch: Blijf 2 minuten bij het kampvuur
description.arabic: ابقَ لمدة دقيقتين بالقرب من نار المخيم
description.brazilian: Fique perto da fogueira por 2 minutos

description.english: Let the hunters live
description.french: Laisser les chasseurs en vie
description.german: Lass die Jäger leben
description.italian: Risparmia i cacciatori
description.spanish: Perdónales la vida a los cazadores
description.japanese: ハンターを生かす
description.dutch: Laat de jagers leven
description.brazilian: Deixe os caçadores vivos

description.english: Make no mistakes when selecting clouds
description.french: Ne faire aucune erreur lors de la sélection des nuages
description.german: Mach beim Auswählen von Wolken keine Fehler

description.spanish: Selecciona las nubes sin cometer ningún error
description.schinese: 选择云雾团时从未失误
description.tchinese: 選擇雲朵的時候不要出錯
description.russian: Не допускайте ошибок при выборе облаков
description.japanese: 間違えずに雲を選ぶ
description.polish: Nie popełnij żadnego błędu podczas wybierania chmur
description.dutch: Maak geen enkele vergissing terwijl je wolken selecteert
description.arabic: لا ترتكب أي أخطاء عند اختيار السحب
description.brazilian: Não cometa erros selecionando nuvens

description.english: Clean the house with the broom

displayName.english: Home is where the hearth is
displayName.german: Wo das Herz ist, da ist man zuhause
displayName.italian: Casa è il posto del cuore
displayName.spanish: Como en casa, en ningún sitio
displayName.polish: Tam dom twój, gdzie serce twoje
displayName.brazilian: Lar é onde o coração está

description.english: Repair the house completely
description.french: Réparer intégralement la maison
description.german: Repariere das Haus komplett
description.italian: Ripara del tutto la casa
description.spanish: Repara toda la casa
description.japanese: 家を完全に修理する
description.dutch: Repareer het hele huis
description.brazilian: Conserte a casa inteira

description.english: Make 6 consecutive volleyball passes without letting the ball touch the ground
description.french: Réussir 6 passes de volleyball consécutives sans que la balle touche le sol
description.german: Mache 6 Pässe mit dem Volleyball hintereinander, ohne dass der Ball den Boden berührt
description.italian: Effettua 6 passaggi consecutivi a pallavolo senza che la palla tocchi terra
description.koreana: 공이 땅에 닿지 않고 6번 연속 배구공 패스하기
description.spanish: Haz 6 pases de voleibol consecutivos sin que la pelota toque suelo
description.schinese: 在不让球落地的前提下连续完成6次抛接球
description.tchinese: 連續 6 次完成排球傳球，並使球不落地
description.russian: Выполните шесть волейбольных передач подряд, не дав мячу коснуться земли
description.japanese: ボールを落とさずに、6回連続でバレーボールのパスをつなげる
description.polish: Wykonaj 6 kolejnych podań w siatkówce bez upuszczenia piłki na ziemię
description.dutch: Pass de volleybal 6 keer op rij zonder dat hij de grond raakt
description.turkish: Voleybolda topun yere değmesine izin vermeden art arda 6 pas yap
description.arabic: مرِّر الكرة 6 مرات متتالية في لعبة الكرة الطائرة دون أن تلمس الكرة الأرضية
description.brazilian: Faça 6 passes consecutivos de vôlei sem deixar a bola tocar o chão
